ComicInfo.Penciller: Guy Davis,Mike Deodato,Ryan Sook,Guy Davis,Mike Deodato,Ryan Sook
ComicInfo.Summary: Introducing The Nevermen. . . the greatest heroes who never existed! Where they come from, no one knows. Where they go when their crime-fighting work is done is a mystery. They're a criminal's worst nightmare and a citizen's best friend. But you had better heed them when they tell you, "This never happened. I was never here." Also in this issue: Xena: Warrior Princess! In the aftermath of her adventure in Hell, Xena returns to discover that things have gotten worse. And in Ragnok, the scarecrow warrior discovers that the monsters from his past have survived into the present!
ComicInfo.Title: And the Night Sings; Ghost; Ragnok
ComicInfo.Writer: Philip Amara,John Wagner,John Arcudi,Philip Amara,John Wagner,John Arcudi
ComicInfo.Letterer: Steve Haynie,John Workman,Mike Heisler,Steve Haynie,John Workman,Mike Heisler
